enumerations.name: MappingScopeEnum
enumerations.note: Defines the scope for the mapping constraints. Aggregated by ComponentClustering.mappingScope, ComponentSeparation.mappingScope

literals.name: mappingScopeCore
literals.description:
The mapping constraint applies to different Cores.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=0

literals.name: mappingScopeEcu
literals.description:
The mapping constraint applies to different Ecus.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=1

literals.name: mappingScopePartition
literals.description:
The mapping constraint applies to different Partitions.
Tags: atp.EnumerationLiteralIndex=2
